title: Nationalism and socialism's impact on revolutions

content.question: Which of the following was a common characteristic of the major revolutions that occurred in Russia, China, and Mexico in the early twentieth century?

choices.label: Nationalism and socialism helped shape all three revolutions.
Foreign powers played an important role in each revolutionâ€™s initial success.
The upper class of each society led the movement that resulted in revolution.
Each revolution failed after a short period of violent civil war.

content.answer: Nationalism and socialism helped shape all three revolutions.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
